thread.title: Saturday's TV pick: At Home With Steph and Dom
thread.title_full: Saturday's TV pick: At Home With Steph and Dom

title: Saturday's TV pick: At Home With Steph and Dom
text:
Submit The much-loved posh couple from Gogglebox have got their own chat show in At Home With Steph and Dom . We're used to seeing them at their plush B&B, but what happens when famous guests come to stay? We'll follow them as they welcome a procession of stars for dinner, and of course, drinks! 
Â© Channel 4 Jerry Springer, Jason Donovan, Louis Walsh, and Phil Tufnell and his wife Dawn, will be enjoying wine-fuelled evenings with the couple. We'll go beyond the Gogglebox sofa, over to the drinks cabinet and see the husband and wife team being as opinionated as ever. At Home With Steph and Dom, C4, 9pm
